product_highlights: Linoleic Acid (99% minimum purity by gas chromatography)
notes: Acme Synthetic Chemicals offers high-purity linoleic acid (99% minimum by gas chromatography). Essential Omega-6 fatty acid. Affordable pricing with multiple applications including barrier repair, anti-inflammatory, and moisturizing. CAS: 60-33-3. Indian supplier.
name: Acme Synthetic Chemicals - Linoleic Acid 99%
description: Acme Synthetic Chemicals supplies high-purity Linoleic Acid (99% minimum by gas chromatography) for barrier repair formulations. This essential Omega-6 fatty acid is critical for skin barrier function and provides anti-inflammatory and moisturizing benefits. Affordable pricing with high purity standards for multiple applications.
certifications.description: Acme Synthetic Chemicals offers ultra-high purity Linoleic Acid (99% minimum by gas chromatography). This essential Omega-6 polyunsaturated fatty acid is critical for skin barrier function, anti-inflammatory action, and moisture retention. Linoleic acid deficiency is associated with compromised barrier function and increased transepidermal water loss.
certifications.notes: Ultra-high purity (99% by GC) ensures optimal performance in barrier repair formulations. Linoleic acid is essential for maintaining skin barrier integrity and reducing inflammation. CAS 60-33-3. Affordable pricing makes it accessible for various formulation applications.
certifications.description: Acme Synthetic Chemicals is a specialty chemicals supplier offering ultra-high purity Linoleic Acid (99% minimum by gas chromatography). This essential omega-6 fatty acid is critical for skin barrier function, providing anti-inflammatory and moisturizing benefits in barrier repair formulations at affordable pricing.
certifications.notes: CAS 60-33-3. High-purity linoleic acid (99% minimum by gas chromatography). Essential Omega-6 fatty acid critical for barrier function. Linoleic acid deficiency is associated with increased transepidermal water loss and barrier dysfunction. Anti-inflammatory and moisturizing properties support healthy skin.
